description: Selected as an open source contributor in IEEE Summer of Code; contributed to multiple full-stack modules and codebase refactors.

description: Worked as a web development intern focusing on MERN stack applications with an emphasis on restaurant discovery platforms.
responsibilities: Architected & developed a MERN-stack restaurant discovery platform managing different cuisine categories and items.
Integrated search, filtering, optimisation via Express REST APIs and server-side rendering(SSR).
Achieved robust state management by using React Context and Reducer, resulting in a 25% increase in user interaction efficiency.
Implemented JWT-based authentication supporting secure log-in.
Collaborated in a team: led weekly code reviews, pair-programmed features, and managed version control with Git.
highlights: Reduced page load times by 35% using SSR
Increased user interaction efficiency by 25% with React Context
